title: I can't download emails
content:
Hi, I can't fetch emails since 2019 was the last time it worked I just updated (128)

I can't figure it out thanks for your help, Gary
creator: gary111

title: Thunderbird Help
content: Hello, when I'm on a web site and choose to contact them, I click on their email. Instead of opening Thunderbird opening I get the annoying pop up that wants me to sign in and open the new Outlook. I do not use Outlook. I do not want to use Outlook. What do I need to do to simply have my Thunderbird open and completely ignore the Outlook? Thank you,
creator: eighthnote44

title: Unread email indicated in the Inbox, but cannot be found
content: In the left column, my Inbox, All Mail, and Important folders indicate that I have 2 unread emails. I can see those two emails in the All Mail folder, the Important folder, but I cannot see them anywhere in the Inbox. I do not have threads turned on in any of the folders. I have checked and tried all filters and sorts. I have tried copying the emails from the All Mail folder to the Inbox, with no changes. Any idea on how I can see them in the Inbox?
creator: johnmoster
